title: Asklytics AI

title: Bookkaru
description: Migrated the application to cloud native infrastructre, containerized and horizontal scaling architecture. Secure the API, access management with zero trust network architecture.

title: Canal Palms Digital Transformation
description: Modernized a luxury housing platform into a secure, automated ecosystem: React 19 front-end with Framer Motion, Laravel 9 APIs with JWT/Sanctum, encrypted storage, and Cloudflare Zero Trust tunnels for hidden origins, DDoS mitigation, and secure payments (UBL/Stripe).
